mil6.1.2:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā mātucchāya mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā vassikasāṭikāya
mil6.1.2:1.1_1: dīyamānāya ‘saṅghe, gotami, dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā’ti.
mil6.1.2:1.2_0: Kiṁ nu kho, bhante nāgasena, tathāgato saṅgharatanato na bhāriko na garuko na dakkhiṇeyyo,
mil6.1.2:1.2_1: yaṁ tathāgato sakāya mātucchāya sayaṁ piñjitaṁ sayaṁ luñcitaṁ sayaṁ pothitaṁ sayaṁ
mil6.1.2:1.2_2: kantitaṁ sayaṁ vāyitaṁ vassikasāṭikaṁ attano dīyamānaṁ saṅghassa dāpesi.
mil6.1.2:1.3_0: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, tathāgato saṅgharatanato uttaro bhaveyya adhiko vā visiṭṭho
mil6.1.2:1.3_1: vā, ‘mayi dinne mahapphalaṁ bhavissatī’ti na tathāgato mātucchāya sayaṁ piñjitaṁ
mil6.1.2:1.3_2: sayaṁ luñcitaṁ sayaṁ pothitaṁ vassikasāṭikaṁ saṅghe dāpeyya, yasmā ca kho, bhante
mil6.1.2:1.3_3: nāgasena tathāgato attānaṁ na patthayati na upanissayati, tasmā tathāgato mātucchāya
mil6.1.2:2.1: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā mātucchāya mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā vassikasāṭikāya dīyamānāya ‘saṅghe, gotami, dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā’ti.
mil6.1.2:2.2_0: Taṁ pana na attano patimānanassa avipākatāya na adakkhiṇeyyatāya, api ca kho, mahārāja,
mil6.1.2:2.2_1: hitatthāya anukampāya anāgatamaddhānaṁ saṅgho mamaccayena cittīkato bhavissatīti
mil6.1.2:2.3: ‘saṅghe, gotami, dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā’ti.
mil6.1.2:3.1_1: rañño santike puttassa vijjamānaṁyeva guṇaṁ pakitteti ‘idha ṭhapito anāgatamaddhānaṁ
mil6.1.2:3.2: Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato hitatthāya anukampāya anāgatamaddhānaṁ saṅgho mamaccayena cittīkato bhavissatīti vijjamāneyeva guṇe pakittayanto evamāha—
mil6.1.2:3.3: ‘saṅghe, gotami, dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā’ti.
mil6.1.2:4.1: Na kho, mahārāja, tāvatakena vassikasāṭikānuppadānamattakena saṅgho tathāgatato adhiko nāma hoti visiṭṭho vā.
mil6.1.2:4.2_0: Yathā, mahārāja, mātāpitaro puttānaṁ ucchādenti parimaddanti nahāpenti sambāhenti,
mil6.1.2:4.2_2: mātāpitūhi adhiko nāma hoti visiṭṭho vā’”ti?
mil6.1.2:4.3: “Na hi, bhante, akāmakaraṇīyā, bhante, puttā mātāpitūnaṁ, tasmā mātāpitaro puttānaṁ ucchādanaparimaddananahāpanasambāhanaṁ karontī”ti.
mil6.1.2:4.4: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, na tāvatakena vassikasāṭikānuppadānamattakena saṅgho tathāgatato adhiko nāma hoti visiṭṭho vāti.
mil6.1.2:4.5: Api ca tathāgato akāmakaraṇīyaṁ karonto mātucchāya taṁ vassikasāṭikaṁ saṅghassa dāpesi.
mil6.1.2:5.1: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, kocideva puriso rañño upāyanaṁ āhareyya, taṁ rājā upāyanaṁ aññatarassa bhaṭassa vā balassa vā senāpatissa vā purohitassa vā dadeyya.
mil6.1.2:5.2: Api nu kho so, mahārāja, puriso tāvatakena upāyanapaṭilābhamattakena raññā adhiko nāma hoti visiṭṭho vā”ti?
mil6.1.2:5.3: “Na hi, bhante, rājabhattiko, bhante, so puriso rājūpajīvī, taṭṭhāne ṭhapento rājā upāyanaṁ detī”ti.
mil6.1.2:5.4: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, na tāvatakena vassikasāṭikānuppadānamattakena saṅgho tathāgatato adhiko nāma hoti visiṭṭho vā, atha kho tathāgatabhattiko tathāgatūpajīvī.
mil6.1.2:5.5: Taṭṭhāne ṭhapento tathāgato saṅghassa vassikasāṭikaṁ dāpesi.
mil6.1.2:6.1_0: Api ca, mahārāja, tathāgatassa evaṁ ahosi ‘sabhāvapaṭipūjanīyo saṅgho, mama santakena
mil6.1.2:6.1_1: saṅghaṁ paṭipūjessāmī’ti saṅghassa vassikasāṭikaṁ dāpesi, na, mahārāja, tathāgato
mil6.1.2:6.1_2: attano yeva paṭipūjanaṁ vaṇṇeti, atha kho ye loke paṭipūjanārahā, tesampi tathāgato
mil6.1.2:7.1_0: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena majjhimanikāyavaralañchake dhammadāyādadhammapariyāye
mil6.1.2:7.1_1: appicchappaṭipattiṁ pakittayamānena ‘asuyeva me purimo bhikkhu pujjataro ca pāsaṁsataro cā’ti.
mil6.1.2:7.2: Natthi, mahārāja, bhavesu koci satto tathāgatato dakkhiṇeyyo vā uttaro vā adhiko vā visiṭṭho vā, tathāgatova uttaro adhiko visiṭṭho.
mil6.1.2:8.1: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, saṁyuttanikāyavare māṇavagāmikena devaputtena bhagavato purato ṭhatvā devamanussamajjhe—
mil6.1.2:11.1_0: Tā kho panetā, mahārāja, māṇavagāmikena devaputtena gāthā sugītā na duggītā, subhāsitā
mil6.1.2:11.1_1: na dubbhāsitā, anumatā ca bhagavatā, nanu, mahārāja, therenapi sāriputtena dhammasenāpatinā bhaṇitaṁ—
mil6.1.2:13.1: Bhagavatā ca bhaṇitaṁ devātidevena ‘ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
